channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Event Streams
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Event Streams

item.title: CVE-2021-29792|2024-08-03T22:18:03.144Z -- ibm -- event%20streams
item.description: IBM Event Streams 10.0, 10.1, 10.2, and 10.3 could allow a user the CA private key to create their own certificates and deploy them in the cluster and gain privileges of another user. IBM X-Force ID: 203450.
